issue.title: www.youtube.com

labels.name: T: Anti Adblock Script
labels.description: The site detects ad blocking

labels.name: NSFW
labels.description: Nudes and porn sites

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
# ATTENTION

> [!NOTE]  
> YouTube changes their detection scripts regularly. That means that sometime you can face the detection message.
> If all the following instructions do not work, please **email filters@adguard.com** or wait until any update is available. 

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use another adblocker in the same time because using another adblocker can delay/lags the YouTube loading (e.g., AdBlock Plus and AdBlock)[^1] OR interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use an userscript related to the bypassing YouTube detection message like [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing).
> Recently, YouTube anti-adblock script added infinite dummy advertisements to try to neutralize the userscript. ( [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing#264](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing/issues/264) )

> [!WARNING]
> Please check that there no another web browser extension that has adblocking feature is enabled on your web browser. It can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> Saving memory feature of your web browser or sleep feature of your operating system can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.
> In this case, please re-enable AdGuard's filtering by toggling the protection toggle.
> Following the instructions can be needed.

### The instructions
1. Force to update the filters by clicking the reload button in AdGuard Browser Extension/AdGuard mobile or update tray menu in your system tray. [^2]
2. Reload the YouTube webpage without cache by pressing <kbd>Ctrl</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd> [^3].
3. Clear cache, cookies and site data of your web browser.
4. Re-open your web browser completely (checking your system monitor[^4] will be better).

[^1]: https://gitlab.com/adblockinc/ext/adblockplus/adblockplusui/-/issues/1576
[^2]: [AdGuard for Windows](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-windows/overview/#tray-menu); [AdGuard for Mac](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-mac/overview/#updates-check); 
[^3]: On macOS, <kbd>Command</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd>
[^4]: Task Manager on Windows, System Monitor on GNOME Shell, KDE System Guard on KDE Plasma or Activity Monitor on macOS. 


Previous issue https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/198973

issue.title: www.youtube.com

labels.name: T: Anti Adblock Script
labels.description: The site detects ad blocking

labels.name: NSFW
labels.description: Nudes and porn sites

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
# ATTENTION

> [!NOTE]  
> YouTube changes their detection scripts regularly. That means that sometime you can face the detection message.
> If all the following instructions do not work, please **email filters@adguard.com** or wait until any update is available. 

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use another adblocker in the same time because using another adblocker can delay/lags the YouTube loading (e.g., AdBlock Plus and AdBlock)[^1] OR interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use an userscript related to the bypassing YouTube detection message like [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing).
> Recently, YouTube anti-adblock script added infinite dummy advertisements to try to neutralize the userscript. ( [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing#264](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing/issues/264) )

> [!WARNING]
> Please check that there no another web browser extension that has adblocking feature is enabled on your web browser. It can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> Saving memory feature of your web browser or sleep feature of your operating system can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.
> In this case, please re-enable AdGuard's filtering by toggling the protection toggle.
> Following the instructions can be needed.

### The instructions
1. Force to update the filters by clicking the reload button in AdGuard Browser Extension/AdGuard mobile or update tray menu in your system tray. [^2]
2. Reload the YouTube webpage without cache by pressing <kbd>Ctrl</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd> [^3].
3. Clear cache, cookies and site data of your web browser.
4. Re-open your web browser completely (checking your system monitor[^4] will be better).

[^1]: https://gitlab.com/adblockinc/ext/adblockplus/adblockplusui/-/issues/1576
[^2]: [AdGuard for Windows](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-windows/overview/#tray-menu); [AdGuard for Mac](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-mac/overview/#updates-check); 
[^3]: On macOS, <kbd>Command</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd>
[^4]: Task Manager on Windows, System Monitor on GNOME Shell, KDE System Guard on KDE Plasma or Activity Monitor on macOS. 


Previous issue https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/198973

comment.body:
Not reproduced on my end.
Try to update the filters (wait almost one minute there), clear browser data, restart it, open the site.
If that doesn't work, you should re-enable the content blockers in Safari settings (wait about the same time as when you update the filters).

issue.body:
# Sorry. The website is infected by AdShield, Inc.

Unfortunately, It is complicated to resolve with a regular adblock rule because the website is being protected by service of Ad-Shield that is an anti-adblock company.

## Userscript Installation
Please block Ad-Shield advertisement by installing [tinyShield userscript](https://github.com/FilteringDev/tinyShield).
Please check its installation guideline written in English by visiting [this URL](https://github.com/FilteringDev/tinyShield/blob/main/README.md).

If you can understand Korean language, please refer https://github.com/FilteringDev/tinyShield/blob/main/README.ko.md.

<details>
<summary>Detailed description for iOS users</summary>

1. Install [**Usercripts**](https://apps.apple.com/us/app/userscripts/id1463298887) app
2. Enable **Usercripts** extension in Safari settings
	* iOS 18+: `System settings` => `Apps` => `Safari` => `Extensions`
	* iOS 17 and older: `System settings` => `Safari` => `Extensions`
	Find **Usercripts**, enable it and allow `On other sites` permission
4. Open the [tinyShield ](https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/@filteringdev/tinyshield@latest/dist/tinyShield.user.js) userscript URL in browser
5. Press the extensions icon in the address bar of Safari and select Userscripts 
6. Tap to install
7. In opened popup, scroll down and press Install button
8. Done.

</details>

## Still Have a Problem?
An issue is occurred when the userscript is applied, please report to [this issue tracker](https://github.com/FilteringDev/tinyShield/issues).

issue.body:
# Sorry. The website is infected by AdShield, Inc.

Unfortunately, It is complicated to resolve with a regular adblock rule because the website is being protected by service of Ad-Shield that is an anti-adblock company.

## Userscript Installation
Please block Ad-Shield advertisement by installing [tinyShield userscript](https://github.com/FilteringDev/tinyShield).
Please check its installation guideline written in English by visiting [this URL](https://github.com/FilteringDev/tinyShield/blob/main/README.md).

If you can understand Korean language, please refer https://github.com/FilteringDev/tinyShield/blob/main/README.ko.md.

<details>
<summary>Detailed description for iOS users</summary>

1. Install [**Usercripts**](https://apps.apple.com/us/app/userscripts/id1463298887) app
2. Enable **Usercripts** extension in Safari settings
	* iOS 18+: `System settings` => `Apps` => `Safari` => `Extensions`
	* iOS 17 and older: `System settings` => `Safari` => `Extensions`
	Find **Usercripts**, enable it and allow `On other sites` permission
4. Open the [tinyShield ](https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/@filteringdev/tinyshield@latest/dist/tinyShield.user.js) userscript URL in browser
5. Press the extensions icon in the address bar of Safari and select Userscripts 
6. Tap to install
7. In opened popup, scroll down and press Install button
8. Done.

</details>

## Still Have a Problem?
An issue is occurred when the userscript is applied, please report to [this issue tracker](https://github.com/FilteringDev/tinyShield/issues).

issue.title: www.welt.de

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
# Sorry. The website is infected by AdShield, Inc.

Unfortunately, It is complicated to resolve with a regular adblock rule because the website is being protected by service of Ad-Shield that is an anti-adblock company.

## Userscript Installation
Please block Ad-Shield advertisement by installing [tinyShield userscript](https://github.com/FilteringDev/tinyShield).
Please check its installation guideline written in English by visiting [this URL](https://github.com/FilteringDev/tinyShield/blob/main/README.md).

If you can understand Korean language, please refer https://github.com/FilteringDev/tinyShield/blob/main/README.ko.md.

<details>
<summary>Detailed description for iOS users</summary>

1. Install [**Usercripts**](https://apps.apple.com/us/app/userscripts/id1463298887) app
2. Enable **Usercripts** extension in Safari settings
	* iOS 18+: `System settings` => `Apps` => `Safari` => `Extensions`
	* iOS 17 and older: `System settings` => `Safari` => `Extensions`
	Find **Usercripts**, enable it and allow `On other sites` permission
4. Open the [tinyShield ](https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/@filteringdev/tinyshield@latest/dist/tinyShield.user.js) userscript URL in browser
5. Press the extensions icon in the address bar of Safari and select Userscripts 
6. Tap to install
7. In opened popup, scroll down and press Install button
8. Done.

</details>

## Still Have a Problem?
An issue is occurred when the userscript is applied, please report to [this issue tracker](https://github.com/FilteringDev/tinyShield/issues).

issue.body:
# Sorry. The website is infected by AdShield, Inc.

Unfortunately, It is complicated to resolve with a regular adblock rule because the website is being protected by service of Ad-Shield that is an anti-adblock company.

## Userscript Installation
Please block Ad-Shield advertisement by installing [tinyShield userscript](https://github.com/FilteringDev/tinyShield).
Please check its installation guideline written in English by visiting [this URL](https://github.com/FilteringDev/tinyShield/blob/main/README.md).

If you can understand Korean language, please refer https://github.com/FilteringDev/tinyShield/blob/main/README.ko.md.

<details>
<summary>Detailed description for iOS users</summary>

1. Install [**Usercripts**](https://apps.apple.com/us/app/userscripts/id1463298887) app
2. Enable **Usercripts** extension in Safari settings
	* iOS 18+: `System settings` => `Apps` => `Safari` => `Extensions`
	* iOS 17 and older: `System settings` => `Safari` => `Extensions`
	Find **Usercripts**, enable it and allow `On other sites` permission
4. Open the [tinyShield ](https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/@filteringdev/tinyshield@latest/dist/tinyShield.user.js) userscript URL in browser
5. Press the extensions icon in the address bar of Safari and select Userscripts 
6. Tap to install
7. In opened popup, scroll down and press Install button
8. Done.

</details>

## Still Have a Problem?
An issue is occurred when the userscript is applied, please report to [this issue tracker](https://github.com/FilteringDev/tinyShield/issues).

comment.body:
Not reproduced with AdGuard filters on my end.
Try to leave only these filters, update them (wait almost one minute there), clear browser data, restart it, open the site.
If that doesn't work, you should re-enable the content blockers in Safari settings (wait about the same time as when you update the filters).
```
AdGuard Base
AdGuard Mobile Ads
AdGuard Tracking Protection
AdGuard Social Media
AdGuard Cookie Notices
AdGuard Popups
AdGuard Mobile App Banners
AdGuard Other Annoyances
AdGuard Widgets
AdGuard Russian
AdGuard German
AdGuard Japanese
AdGuard Dutch
AdGuard Spanish/Portuguese
AdGuard Turkish
AdGuard French
AdGuard Ukrainian
AdGuard Chinese
```

issue.title: www.youtube.com

labels.name: T: Anti Adblock Script
labels.description: The site detects ad blocking

labels.name: NSFW
labels.description: Nudes and porn sites

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
# ATTENTION

> [!NOTE]  
> YouTube changes their detection scripts regularly. That means that sometime you can face the detection message.
> If all the following instructions do not work, please **email filters@adguard.com** or wait until any update is available. 

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use another adblocker in the same time because using another adblocker can delay/lags the YouTube loading (e.g., AdBlock Plus and AdBlock)[^1] OR interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use an userscript related to the bypassing YouTube detection message like [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing).
> Recently, YouTube anti-adblock script added infinite dummy advertisements to try to neutralize the userscript. ( [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing#264](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing/issues/264) )

> [!WARNING]
> Please check that there no another web browser extension that has adblocking feature is enabled on your web browser. It can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> Saving memory feature of your web browser or sleep feature of your operating system can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.
> In this case, please re-enable AdGuard's filtering by toggling the protection toggle.
> Following the instructions can be needed.

### The instructions
1. Force to update the filters by clicking the reload button in AdGuard Browser Extension/AdGuard mobile or update tray menu in your system tray. [^2]
2. Reload the YouTube webpage without cache by pressing <kbd>Ctrl</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd> [^3].
3. Clear cache, cookies and site data of your web browser.
4. Re-open your web browser completely (checking your system monitor[^4] will be better).

[^1]: https://gitlab.com/adblockinc/ext/adblockplus/adblockplusui/-/issues/1576
[^2]: [AdGuard for Windows](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-windows/overview/#tray-menu); [AdGuard for Mac](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-mac/overview/#updates-check); 
[^3]: On macOS, <kbd>Command</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd>
[^4]: Task Manager on Windows, System Monitor on GNOME Shell, KDE System Guard on KDE Plasma or Activity Monitor on macOS. 


Previous issue https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/198973

comment.body:
Not reproduced with AdGuard filters on my end.
Try to leave only AdGuard filters, update them (wait almost one minute there), disable `Adblock plus`, clear browser data, restart it, open the site.
If that doesn't work, you should re-enable the content blockers in Safari settings (wait about the same time as when you update the filters).

issue.title: 1password ad network
issue.body:
### Filters:

**Ad Blocking**

AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, AdGuard Base filter

**Privacy**

AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter

**Social Widgets**

AdGuard Social Media filter

**Annoyances**

AdGuard Annoyances filter

---

Hi

Link full of tracking parameters

```
https://1password.com/?cjdata=MXxZfDB8WXww&cjevent=08d53e95b6a711f0828401430a18b8fa&utm_medium=affiliate&utm_source=Techlore%2C+Inc.&utm_campaign=5752683&utm_content=100370169&utm_term=Evergreen+Link+for+1Password+-+Password+Manager
```

To reproduce follow `https://techlore.tech/resources/#techlore-guides`, scroll down to recommendation, find 1Password, click on referral link. Your connection will look like:

`https://www.tkqlhce.com/click-100370169-15734885` -> `https://cj.dotomi.com/8066y1A9S/18D/RVXTUYYV/RQQTXQRWZ/Q/Q/Q?t=q3clxxtw2F%2F000.xouplgi.gsq3c3c3c53c43c` -> `https://www.emjcd.com/eq65wktsC/krw/9DFBCGGD/988BF89EH/8/C88A8ECGDCB8G8EEFG:B3-HGdiqL9ll/8GlDBmHDjEiF99n8GAGC89CB8i9GjGni?o=y%3c29E!NZ2O-CRT6L863A2FMMM.JAGB724.2EC3c3c3cR3cQ3c` -> `https://1password.com/?cjdata=MXxZfDB8WXww&cjevent=08d53e95b6a711f0828401430a18b8fa&utm_medium=affiliate&utm_source=Techlore%2C+Inc.&utm_campaign=5752683&utm_content=100370169&utm_term=Evergreen+Link+for+1Password+-+Password+Manager`

Maybe block `tkqlhce.com`, `dotomi.com` (already listed in adguard mobile ads), `emjcd.com`

Also I think it will be great idea to block:
`wntokfh.frp` since it have relations with `dotomi.com`:

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/df2fcae5-825b-4a19-859f-ea28ac5d3d3d)

Also `cjdata`, `cjevent` should be added to list of remove parameters.

issue.body:
Hi

There is affiliates here: `https://techlore.tech/affiliates/`

Here I go:

```
https://affiliate.orangewebsite.com/idevaffiliate.php?id=10799
https://click.linksynergy.com/deeplink?id=3Q9OclTeTTg&mid=44583&murl=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.newegg.com%2Fp%2Fpl%3Fd%3Dyubikey
https://www.amazon.com/s?k=yubikey&crid=3FQBGEZFTOC50&sprefix=yubikey,aps,134&linkCode=sl2&tag=techlore06c-20&linkId=9d5b419414947a4a0b4b07a8629c907f&language=en_US&ref_=as_li_ss_tl
https://www.amazon.com/s?k=fairphone&crid=39AUAW3F8G0NH&sprefix=fairphone,aps,135&linkCode=sl2&tag=techlore06c-20&linkId=1466575a0de9b01ec39c5dcd723ba88c&language=en_US&ref_=as_li_ss_tl

```
In `https://click.linksynergy.com/deeplink?id=3Q9OclTeTTg&mid=44583&murl=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.newegg.com%2Fp%2Fpl%3Fd%3Dyubikey` it seems `id` and `mid` can be harmlessly stripped


In `https://www.amazon.com/s?k=fairphone&crid=39AUAW3F8G0NH&sprefix=fairphone,aps,135&linkCode=sl2&tag=techlore06c-20&linkId=1466575a0de9b01ec39c5dcd723ba88c&language=en_US&ref_=as_li_ss_tl` parameters like `crid`, `sprefix`, `linkCode`, `tag`, `linkId` can be stripped


Also, when accessing `https://bestbuycreators.7tiv.net/55qyx3` it redirects you to:
```
https://www.ojrq.net/p/?return=https2F%2Fbestbuycreators.7tiv.net2F62254242F281023D5004624013D17000000159483DTL-7190813DHenry26u253A252Fwww.bestbuy.com252Fsearchpage.jsp253Dgoogle2526id26adcampaignid26svlink26level%3D1&cid=28102&tpsync=yes&auth=599eb4b747b2cf61

https://bestbuycreators.7tiv.net/c/6225424/2186093/28102?subId1=500462401&subId2=1700000015948&subId3=TL-719081&sharedid=Henry%20Fisher&u=https2F%2Fwww.bestbuy.com2Fsearchpage.jsp3Dgoogle26id%3Dpcat17071&adcampaignid=0&svlink=12545351&level=1&brwsr=c1ea07f3-b71d-11f0-bc0c-2f446ab46bae&brwsrsig=TdwWJA2ur1P30DP1EH2rLRWP1PB19b

https://bestbuy.7tiv.net/c/5846385/614286/10014?u=https2F%2Fwww.bestbuy.com2Fsearchpage.jsp3Dgoogle26id26irgwc26afsrc%3D1&subid1=QyO0CbTAFxycTcQ29w3OY3PPUkpUcRx2gSKO3c0&subid2=6225424&subid3=billing%40techlore.tech

https://www.bestbuy.com/site/searchpage.jsp?st=google+pixel&id=pcat17071&irgwc=1&afsrc=1&irclickid=QRbSpsTAFxycWlPQVOXfk3J1UkpUcRx3gSKO3c0&ref=388&loc=6225424&irmpname=billing%40techlore.tech
```

And last ones:

```
https://www.tubebuddy.com/pricing?a=techlore
https://artlist.io/artlist-70446/?artlist_aid=techlore_2890
https://www.parallels.com/landingpage/pd/affiliate/?x-clickref=&utm_medium=affiliate&utm_source=partnerize&utm_campaign=PL-other-all-defaultaffiliatelink&x-source=pz
https://www.fastmail.com/?pscd=join.fastmail.com&ps_partner_key=NGVlZmE1YWJmMDFj&ps_xid=LfmFKSgX1LmWYP&gsxid=LfmFKSgX1LmWYP&gspk=NGVlZmE1YWJmMDFj
```

This `https://prf.hn/l/pmnNkkJ` redirects to `https://www.parallels.com/landingpage/pd/affiliate/?x-clickref=&utm_medium=affiliate&utm_source=partnerize&utm_campaign=PL-other-all-defaultaffiliatelink&x-source=pz`

This `https://join.fastmail.com/4eefa5abf01c` redirects to `https://www.fastmail.com/?pscd=join.fastmail.com&ps_partner_key=NGVlZmE1YWJmMDFj&ps_xid=LfmFKSgX1LmWYP&gsxid=LfmFKSgX1LmWYP&gspk=NGVlZmE1YWJmMDFj`

### Note:

Sorry for not using report tool. It is extremely inconvenient for me, since I can report only one thing at time and I need to always solve captcha. Reporting directly is waaaay faster.

issue.title: 1password ad network

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Filters:

**Ad Blocking**

AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, AdGuard Base filter

**Privacy**

AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter

**Social Widgets**

AdGuard Social Media filter

**Annoyances**

AdGuard Annoyances filter

---

Hi

Link full of tracking parameters

```
https://1password.com/?cjdata=MXxZfDB8WXww&cjevent=08d53e95b6a711f0828401430a18b8fa&utm_medium=affiliate&utm_source=Techlore%2C+Inc.&utm_campaign=5752683&utm_content=100370169&utm_term=Evergreen+Link+for+1Password+-+Password+Manager
```

To reproduce follow `https://techlore.tech/resources/#techlore-guides`, scroll down to recommendation, find 1Password, click on referral link. Your connection will look like:

`https://www.tkqlhce.com/click-100370169-15734885` -> `https://cj.dotomi.com/8066y1A9S/18D/RVXTUYYV/RQQTXQRWZ/Q/Q/Q?t=q3clxxtw2F%2F000.xouplgi.gsq3c3c3c53c43c` -> `https://www.emjcd.com/eq65wktsC/krw/9DFBCGGD/988BF89EH/8/C88A8ECGDCB8G8EEFG:B3-HGdiqL9ll/8GlDBmHDjEiF99n8GAGC89CB8i9GjGni?o=y%3c29E!NZ2O-CRT6L863A2FMMM.JAGB724.2EC3c3c3cR3cQ3c` -> `https://1password.com/?cjdata=MXxZfDB8WXww&cjevent=08d53e95b6a711f0828401430a18b8fa&utm_medium=affiliate&utm_source=Techlore%2C+Inc.&utm_campaign=5752683&utm_content=100370169&utm_term=Evergreen+Link+for+1Password+-+Password+Manager`

Maybe block `tkqlhce.com`, `dotomi.com` (already listed in adguard mobile ads), `emjcd.com`

Also I think it will be great idea to block:
`wntokfh.frp` since it have relations with `dotomi.com`:

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/df2fcae5-825b-4a19-859f-ea28ac5d3d3d)

Also `cjdata`, `cjevent` should be added to list of remove parameters.

There is affiliates here: `https://techlore.tech/affiliates/`

Here I go:

```
https://affiliate.orangewebsite.com/idevaffiliate.php?id=10799
https://click.linksynergy.com/deeplink?id=3Q9OclTeTTg&mid=44583&murl=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.newegg.com%2Fp%2Fpl%3Fd%3Dyubikey
https://www.amazon.com/s?k=yubikey&crid=3FQBGEZFTOC50&sprefix=yubikey,aps,134&linkCode=sl2&tag=techlore06c-20&linkId=9d5b419414947a4a0b4b07a8629c907f&language=en_US&ref_=as_li_ss_tl
https://www.amazon.com/s?k=fairphone&crid=39AUAW3F8G0NH&sprefix=fairphone,aps,135&linkCode=sl2&tag=techlore06c-20&linkId=1466575a0de9b01ec39c5dcd723ba88c&language=en_US&ref_=as_li_ss_tl

```
In `https://click.linksynergy.com/deeplink?id=3Q9OclTeTTg&mid=44583&murl=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.newegg.com%2Fp%2Fpl%3Fd%3Dyubikey` it seems `id` and `mid` can be harmlessly stripped


In `https://www.amazon.com/s?k=fairphone&crid=39AUAW3F8G0NH&sprefix=fairphone,aps,135&linkCode=sl2&tag=techlore06c-20&linkId=1466575a0de9b01ec39c5dcd723ba88c&language=en_US&ref_=as_li_ss_tl` parameters like `crid`, `sprefix`, `linkCode`, `tag`, `linkId` can be stripped


Also, when accessing `https://bestbuycreators.7tiv.net/55qyx3` it redirects you to:
```
https://www.ojrq.net/p/?return=https2F%2Fbestbuycreators.7tiv.net2F62254242F281023D5004624013D17000000159483DTL-7190813DHenry26u253A252Fwww.bestbuy.com252Fsearchpage.jsp253Dgoogle2526id26adcampaignid26svlink26level%3D1&cid=28102&tpsync=yes&auth=599eb4b747b2cf61

https://bestbuycreators.7tiv.net/c/6225424/2186093/28102?subId1=500462401&subId2=1700000015948&subId3=TL-719081&sharedid=Henry%20Fisher&u=https2F%2Fwww.bestbuy.com2Fsearchpage.jsp3Dgoogle26id%3Dpcat17071&adcampaignid=0&svlink=12545351&level=1&brwsr=c1ea07f3-b71d-11f0-bc0c-2f446ab46bae&brwsrsig=TdwWJA2ur1P30DP1EH2rLRWP1PB19b

https://bestbuy.7tiv.net/c/5846385/614286/10014?u=https2F%2Fwww.bestbuy.com2Fsearchpage.jsp3Dgoogle26id26irgwc26afsrc%3D1&subid1=QyO0CbTAFxycTcQ29w3OY3PPUkpUcRx2gSKO3c0&subid2=6225424&subid3=billing%40techlore.tech

https://www.bestbuy.com/site/searchpage.jsp?st=google+pixel&id=pcat17071&irgwc=1&afsrc=1&irclickid=QRbSpsTAFxycWlPQVOXfk3J1UkpUcRx3gSKO3c0&ref=388&loc=6225424&irmpname=billing%40techlore.tech
```

And last ones:

```
https://www.tubebuddy.com/pricing?a=techlore
https://artlist.io/artlist-70446/?artlist_aid=techlore_2890
https://www.parallels.com/landingpage/pd/affiliate/?x-clickref=&utm_medium=affiliate&utm_source=partnerize&utm_campaign=PL-other-all-defaultaffiliatelink&x-source=pz
https://www.fastmail.com/?pscd=join.fastmail.com&ps_partner_key=NGVlZmE1YWJmMDFj&ps_xid=LfmFKSgX1LmWYP&gsxid=LfmFKSgX1LmWYP&gspk=NGVlZmE1YWJmMDFj
```

This `https://prf.hn/l/pmnNkkJ` redirects to `https://www.parallels.com/landingpage/pd/affiliate/?x-clickref=&utm_medium=affiliate&utm_source=partnerize&utm_campaign=PL-other-all-defaultaffiliatelink&x-source=pz`

This `https://join.fastmail.com/4eefa5abf01c` redirects to `https://www.fastmail.com/?pscd=join.fastmail.com&ps_partner_key=NGVlZmE1YWJmMDFj&ps_xid=LfmFKSgX1LmWYP&gsxid=LfmFKSgX1LmWYP&gspk=NGVlZmE1YWJmMDFj`

### Note:

Sorry for not using report tool. It is extremely inconvenient for me, since I can report only one thing at time and I need to always solve captcha. Reporting directly is waaaay faster.

In `https://www.amazon.com/s?k=fairphone&crid=39AUAW3F8G0NH&sprefix=fairphone,aps,135&linkCode=sl2&tag=techlore06c-20&linkId=1466575a0de9b01ec39c5dcd723ba88c&language=en_US&ref_=as_li_ss_tl` parameters like `crid`, `sprefix`, `linkCode`, `tag`, `linkId` can be stripped


Also, when accessing `https://bestbuycreators.7tiv.net/55qyx3` it redirects you to:
```
https://www.ojrq.net/p/?return=https2F%2Fbestbuycreators.7tiv.net2F62254242F281023D5004624013D17000000159483DTL-7190813DHenry26u253A252Fwww.bestbuy.com252Fsearchpage.jsp253Dgoogle2526id26adcampaignid26svlink26level%3D1&cid=28102&tpsync=yes&auth=599eb4b747b2cf61

https://bestbuycreators.7tiv.net/c/6225424/2186093/28102?subId1=500462401&subId2=1700000015948&subId3=TL-719081&sharedid=Henry%20Fisher&u=https2F%2Fwww.bestbuy.com2Fsearchpage.jsp3Dgoogle26id%3Dpcat17071&adcampaignid=0&svlink=12545351&level=1&brwsr=c1ea07f3-b71d-11f0-bc0c-2f446ab46bae&brwsrsig=TdwWJA2ur1P30DP1EH2rLRWP1PB19b

https://bestbuy.7tiv.net/c/5846385/614286/10014?u=https2F%2Fwww.bestbuy.com2Fsearchpage.jsp3Dgoogle26id26irgwc26afsrc%3D1&subid1=QyO0CbTAFxycTcQ29w3OY3PPUkpUcRx2gSKO3c0&subid2=6225424&subid3=billing%40techlore.tech

https://www.bestbuy.com/site/searchpage.jsp?st=google+pixel&id=pcat17071&irgwc=1&afsrc=1&irclickid=QRbSpsTAFxycWlPQVOXfk3J1UkpUcRx3gSKO3c0&ref=388&loc=6225424&irmpname=billing%40techlore.tech
```

And last ones:

```
https://www.tubebuddy.com/pricing?a=techlore
https://artlist.io/artlist-70446/?artlist_aid=techlore_2890
https://www.parallels.com/landingpage/pd/affiliate/?x-clickref=&utm_medium=affiliate&utm_source=partnerize&utm_campaign=PL-other-all-defaultaffiliatelink&x-source=pz
https://www.fastmail.com/?pscd=join.fastmail.com&ps_partner_key=NGVlZmE1YWJmMDFj&ps_xid=LfmFKSgX1LmWYP&gsxid=LfmFKSgX1LmWYP&gspk=NGVlZmE1YWJmMDFj
```

This `https://prf.hn/l/pmnNkkJ` redirects to `https://www.parallels.com/landingpage/pd/affiliate/?x-clickref=&utm_medium=affiliate&utm_source=partnerize&utm_campaign=PL-other-all-defaultaffiliatelink&x-source=pz`

This `https://join.fastmail.com/4eefa5abf01c` redirects to `https://www.fastmail.com/?pscd=join.fastmail.com&ps_partner_key=NGVlZmE1YWJmMDFj&ps_xid=LfmFKSgX1LmWYP&gsxid=LfmFKSgX1LmWYP&gspk=NGVlZmE1YWJmMDFj`

### Note:

Sorry for not using report tool. It is extremely inconvenient for me, since I can report only one thing at time and I need to always solve captcha. Reporting directly is waaaay faster.

issue.body:
### Filters:

**Ad Blocking**

AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, AdGuard Base filter

**Privacy**

AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter

**Social Widgets**

AdGuard Social Media filter

**Annoyances**

AdGuard Annoyances filter

---

Hi

Link full of tracking parameters

```
https://1password.com/?cjdata=MXxZfDB8WXww&cjevent=08d53e95b6a711f0828401430a18b8fa&utm_medium=affiliate&utm_source=Techlore%2C+Inc.&utm_campaign=5752683&utm_content=100370169&utm_term=Evergreen+Link+for+1Password+-+Password+Manager
```

To reproduce follow `https://techlore.tech/resources/#techlore-guides`, scroll down to recommendation, find 1Password, click on referral link. Your connection will look like:

`https://www.tkqlhce.com/click-100370169-15734885` -> `https://cj.dotomi.com/8066y1A9S/18D/RVXTUYYV/RQQTXQRWZ/Q/Q/Q?t=q3clxxtw2F%2F000.xouplgi.gsq3c3c3c53c43c` -> `https://www.emjcd.com/eq65wktsC/krw/9DFBCGGD/988BF89EH/8/C88A8ECGDCB8G8EEFG:B3-HGdiqL9ll/8GlDBmHDjEiF99n8GAGC89CB8i9GjGni?o=y%3c29E!NZ2O-CRT6L863A2FMMM.JAGB724.2EC3c3c3cR3cQ3c` -> `https://1password.com/?cjdata=MXxZfDB8WXww&cjevent=08d53e95b6a711f0828401430a18b8fa&utm_medium=affiliate&utm_source=Techlore%2C+Inc.&utm_campaign=5752683&utm_content=100370169&utm_term=Evergreen+Link+for+1Password+-+Password+Manager`

Maybe block `tkqlhce.com`, `dotomi.com` (already listed in adguard mobile ads), `emjcd.com`

Also I think it will be great idea to block:
`wntokfh.frp` since it have relations with `dotomi.com`:

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/df2fcae5-825b-4a19-859f-ea28ac5d3d3d)

Also `cjdata`, `cjevent` should be added to list of remove parameters.

comment.body:
@jellizaveta:

> https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/commit/93dcdf3ce019320d23990cb4f2e2c7c9dc927e93

### Issue:
The previous commit(s) for that rule seems to cause an issue at some `wix.com` / `wixsite.com` sites, where the scrollbar disappears and the page kinda freezes.

### Example:
`https://fluffles6.wixsite.com/milliebobbybrown/`

### Possible fix:
`||parastorage.com/services/wix-thunderbolt/dist/popups.*$script`

comment.body:
Известно, что эта проблема решается с помощью AdGuard Extra.

Если вы пользуетесь AdGuard на устройствах Windows, Mac или Android, пожалуйста, убедитесь, что AdGuard Extra включена в настройках приложения.

Если вы используете расширение AdGuard для браузера, рекомендуется также установить AdGuard Extra.

* [Установка на браузеры Chrome, Edge или другие, основанные на Chromium](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Установка на Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

issue.body:
# Sorry. The website is infected by AdShield, Inc.

Unfortunately, It is complicated to resolve with a regular adblock rule because the website is being protected by service of Ad-Shield that is an anti-adblock company.

## Userscript Installation
Please block Ad-Shield advertisement by installing [tinyShield userscript](https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield).
Please check its installation guideline written in English by visiting [this URL](https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield/blob/main/README.md).

If you can understand Korean language, please refer https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield/blob/main/README.ko.md.

## Still Have a Problem?
An issue is occurred when the userscript is applied, please report to [this issue tracker](https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield/issues).
